alert.note: Alert for Bienville; De Soto; Jackson; Lincoln; Natchitoches; Ouachita; Red River; Sabine; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 10:39PM CDT until April 12 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jackson Parish in north central Louisiana... Southeastern De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northern Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... West central Ouachita Parish in north central Louisiana... Eastern Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northeastern Sabine Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southern Lincoln Parish in north central Louisiana... Winn Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1039 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gibsland to 14 miles east of Converse, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ruston, Natchitoches, Claiborne, Grambling, Winnfield, Jonesboro, Campti, Allen, Choudrant, Simsboro, Martin, Chatham, Clarence, Hodge, Goldonna, North Hodge, Dodson, East Hodge, Saline and Lucky. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central and northwestern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central and northwestern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; De Soto; Jackson; Lincoln; Natchitoches; Ouachita; Red River; Sabine; Winn
